game.name: Dilemma
game.categories: Single-player, Custom Volume Controls, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: You don't cure patients; you decide their fate. In this grim medical sim, review records and face impossible bioethical dilemmas. Consult the Medical Bible and choose who gets the bed. Every signature impacts your Ethics, Reputation, and Legal Risk. In a broken system, mercy is a dangerous luxury.
